text: he ahle kitaab! tumhaare paas rasulon ke aane ka kram band hone ke pashchaat, hamaare rasool aa gaye[1] hain, vah tumhaare lie (saty ko) ujaagar kar rahe hain, taaki tum ye na kaho ki hamaare paas koee shubh soochana sunaane vaala tatha saavadhaan karane vaala (nabee) nahin aaya, to tumhaare paas shubh soochana sunaane tatha saavadhaan karane vaala aa gaya hai tatha allaah jo chaahe, kar sakata hai
